declarations.comments:
The resource cleanup monad transformer.

This monad transformer extends the base monad with a mutable registry for tracking resource cleanup actions.
At the end of evaluation all remaining cleanup actions are executed.
declarations.title: ResourceT

declarations.comments: The `Resource` monad is a synonym for `ResourceT Aff`.
declarations.title: Resource

declarations.comments: Run a computation in the `ResourceT` monad, while changing it to `Aff` to ensure the cleanup will run safely.
declarations.title: runResourceT

declarations.comments: Run an `Aff` computation in the `ResourceT` monad.
declarations.title: runResource

declarations.comments: Change the type of the result in a `ResourceT` monad action.
declarations.title: mapResourceT

declarations.comments: Register some release action to run in the cleanup phase, returning the `ReleaseKey` for the action.
declarations.title: register

declarations.comments:
Given logic to acquire and free a resource `a`, this will: acquire the resource, register the release action, and
return the resource and the action's `ReleaseKey`
declarations.title: acquire

declarations.comments: Remove the release action associated with the key.
declarations.title: deregister

declarations.comments: Trigger the release action for the `ReleaseKey` if it is registered.
declarations.title: release

declarations.comments:
Trigger the release action for the `ReleaseKey` if it is registered. Returns `true` if the key was found,
`false` otherwise.
declarations.title: release'

declarations.comments: Returns `true` if the given `ReleaseKey` is registered in the current `ResourceT`, and `false` otherwise.
declarations.title: isRegistered

declarations.comments: Returns `true` if the given `ReleaseKey` is not registered in the current `ResourceT`, and `true` otherwise.
declarations.title: isReleased

declarations.comments: Create a function that will track all running Aff fibers and kill them in the resource cleanup.
declarations.title: create

declarations.comments:
The resource cleanup monad transformer.

This monad transformer extends the base monad with a mutable registry for tracking resource cleanup actions.
At the end of evaluation all remaining cleanup actions are executed.
declarations.title: ResourceT

declarations.comments: The `Resource` monad is a synonym for `ResourceT Aff`.
declarations.title: Resource

declarations.comments: Change the type of the result in a `ResourceT` monad action.
declarations.title: mapResourceT

declarations.comments: Run a computation in the `ResourceT` monad, while changing it to `Aff` to ensure the cleanup will run safely.
declarations.title: runResourceT

declarations.title: runResource

declarations.comments:
This function mirrors `join` at the transformer level: it will collapse two levels of `ResourceT` into a single
`ResourceT`.
declarations.title: joinResourceT
